title: Is there a way to buy one of the PROJECT skins and NOT get the special border?
body: I really want to buy PROJECT Lucian as soon as possible, but don't really like the First Strike border that comes with buying the skins during their week of release. Is there a way to opt out of the border?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

There won't be a way to obtain the skin without the border during the first week.

The first week the PROJECT skins come out ( 9/8 - 9/15 23:59 PDT ), they'll be priced at 1350 RP, or 1820 RP for PROJECT: Yi. After that, the skins will be unavailable in the store until 9/17. On 9/17, content will return to the store, and all 1350 RP skins will be on sale for 975 RP. This sale price will be applicable until 9/24.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-28T22:09:18.244+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> There won't be a way to obtain the skin without the border during the first week.
> 
> The first week the PROJECT skins come out ( 9/8 - 9/15 23:59 PDT ), they'll be priced at 1350 RP, or 1820 RP for PROJECT: Yi. After that, the skins will be unavailable in the store until 9/17. On 9/17, content will return to the store, and all 1350 RP skins will be on sale for 975 RP. This sale price will be applicable until 9/24.

I just want to point out that I was probably going to buy Project:Yi, but since you guys are using this scummy marketing tactic to get people to buy the skins on release with a limited edition border, I probably won't buy him at all.

> [{quoted}](name=That Evelynn,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=00040002,timestamp=2015-08-29T20:24:59.052+0000)
>
> I just want to point out that I was probably going to buy Project:Yi, but since you guys are using this scummy marketing tactic to get people to buy the skins on release with a limited edition border, I probably won't buy him at all.

Im sure with the amount of people buying it, they wouldn't even notice if you don't

> [{quoted}](name=Paero,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=000400020001,timestamp=2015-09-11T11:09:04.327+0000)
>
> Im sure with the amount of people buying it, they wouldn't even notice if you don't

They might notice me playing PSO instead of League of Legends. :^)

Just about had it with this garbage company.

> [{quoted}](name=That Evelynn,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=0004000200010001,timestamp=2015-09-11T17:08:07.279+0000)

Of all the things to get mad about, this is probably the stupidest thing you could have picked.

> [{quoted}](name=NotSid,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=00040002000100010000,timestamp=2015-09-11T17:53:07.689+0000)
>
> Of all the things to get mad about, this is probably the stupidest thing you could have picked.

I never said it was the only thing, did I?

And it's not really that stupid. "Oh sweet a new legendary skin on a champion I actually play. I can wait to buy it because they are price protected. I can use my bestbuy gift card on something else instead of an RP card"

Rito Games: "Buy it early and get a unique limited edition border! HUE HUE HUE"

There are SEVERAL things I am "mad about". This is only one of them. By the time this skin was announced, I was already playing PSO. Now it's just a reason for me to KEEP playing PSO, and not come back to League at all (except my one match every 3 weeks to not decay, of course).

> [{quoted}](name=That Evelynn,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=000400020001000100000000,timestamp=2015-09-11T18:02:03.340+0000)

>

> 
> Rito Games: "Buy it early and get a unique limited edition border! HUE HUE HUE"
> 
> There are SEVERAL things I am "mad about". This is only one of them. By the time this skin was announced, I was already playing PSO. Now it's just a reason for me to KEEP playing PSO, and not come back to League at all (except my one match every 3 weeks to not decay, of course).

No, no it isn't a legitimate reason to be mad at Riot over. It's a border. Grow up.

> [{quoted}](name=NotSid,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=0004000200010001000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-11T19:30:55.485+0000)
>
> No, no it isn't a legitimate reason to be mad at Riot over. It's a border. Grow up.

"it's a border"

I guess I shouldn't have worked hard to get my plat rank for my plat border either then, right?

I actually fucking like borders. Maybe you don't give a shit about a "border" but that doesn't mean everyone is the same way. I know people who use skins solely for their loading screen splash art, even though other skins have superior in-game models.

You tell me to grow up. But wouldn't voting with my wallet and NOT buying it, like I plan on doing, be the most adult thing I could actually do? :^)

> [{quoted}](name=That Evelynn,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=00040002000100010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-11T19:40:24.471+0000)

> 
> You tell me to grow up. But wouldn't voting with my wallet and NOT buying it, like I plan on doing, be the most adult thing I could actually do? :^)

Or maybe just wait until you can buy it without the border if you hate the thought of it so much. They are giving you something cool extra for no added price. Heaven forbid someone cant clearly see your ranked border while you're using that one single skin on that one single champion. The border doesn't even cover your ranked border, they go along the inner edge...not sure how you are managing to throw a hissy fit like this while calling yourself an adult at the same time.....

> [{quoted}](name=Pointy Rock,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=000400020001000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-11T22:40:40.927+0000)
>
> Or maybe just wait until you can buy it without the border if you hate the thought of it so much. They are giving you something cool extra for no added price. Heaven forbid someone cant clearly see your ranked border while you're using that one single skin on that one single champion. The border doesn't even cover your ranked border, they go along the inner edge...not sure how you are managing to throw a hissy fit like this while calling yourself an adult at the same time.....

Pretty sure you're not able to read.

I'm complaining that I do NOT get the border if I buy it later. I WANT the border.

There should be ZERO incentives to buy legendary skins early. I should be able to buy it 6 months from now and get the same perks as the people who bought it the first week. Legendary skins are price-protected. They shouldn't use some loophole to bait people into buying it early with an exclusive border. If the skin comes with a border, it should ALWAYS come with a border.

Players (and my) expectations when a legendary skin is released is: "I will be able to buy this whenever I want. It will never go on sale. I can buy it when I have the money for it."

They just violated that expectation with the exclusive border. Now if I want the border, I **_HAVE_** to buy it on release. That's not how a legendary skin is supposed to work.

> [{quoted}](name=That Evelynn,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=0004000200010001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-11T23:31:38.730+0000)
>

Legendary skins are price-protected. They shouldn't use some loophole to bait people into buying it early with an exclusive border. If the skin comes with a border, it should ALWAYS come with a border.

>

You're the kind of person everyone who's worked in retail hates. Hell, you're the kind of person EVERYONE hates.

> [{quoted}](name=NotSid,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=00040002000100010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-12T21:01:29.044+0000)
>
> You're the kind of person everyone who's worked in retail hates. Hell, you're the kind of person EVERYONE hates.

Because how I act toward Riot is how I act toward retail employees, right? (sarcasm)

I mean fuck, I have had a large coffee chain fuck up my coffee so many times. And I order my coffee with milk and sweetener, so when they dump cream and sugar into it, it's kind of a big deal (calorie-wise at least).

Do I take the coffee back and bitch? No. I drink it, and when they have fucked it up enough times, I get fed up and start ordering it black with milk and sweetener on the side, which is pretty much impossible to fuck up.

And if that's how I treat a coffee chain, which is pretty much obligated to fix my drink if I complain (or offer me free drinks via coupons if I complain to head-office from home), that just goes to show you how bad Riot has irked me over the years, doesn't it? I have the option of getting my coffee fixed. I don't even bother.

> [{quoted}](name=That Evelynn,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=000400020001000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-12T21:23:17.694+0000)

Ummm... its an exclusive offer meant to reward loyal players who have anticipated the skin. LIKE ANY OTHER NEW THING OFFERS A PROMO FOR PRE-ORDERING. The fact you have a problem with this shows you just suck at understanding consumerism or worse yet you understand it but don't accept it under the wrongful veil of claiming that "RIOT WRONGED ME"

Yeah its limited time, but you neglect to notice they put the damn skins on sale very next week as a grace for others who want the skins but cheaper. don't see you bitching about that? and if you did i bet it would be like this "STUPID RIOT MAKING SKINS ON SALE FOR 975 SAVING US MONEY, WE ALL KNOW THEY ARE JUST DOING THAT SO WE DON'T FEEL AS BAD BUYING 1350'S IF WE MISSED IT" but then you'd be wrongfully looking at the quality. 


All in all your a self entitled prick who deserves nothing yet claims people should give a damn

YOU'RE NOT EVEN A LOYAL CUSTOMER so you don't even fall into the category riot wants to reward- as you even stated your playing some other crappy game. 

So get the f*** off your my little pony and take a trip down reality lane and log the f*** off the forums.

No it doesn't in fact it shows us you do not know how to present an issue without (quoting you) "bring it back and bitching" so you resort to more primitive means like avoiding the problem.

When they get my coffee wrong i ask the next person in line if i can ask them quickly to fix my coffee then when i go to the register i politely say "when you get a moment I asked for a cream and sweetener if you could?" 9 times outta 10 i get an "i'm so sorry be right back"

Those people deal with close to 1000 people per shift, if they get a coffee wrong big woop; don't feel all noble because you grudgingly drank the calorie filled water.
so the real reason you don't get it fixed is because it involves the effort of getting out of your car. it all comes out now.

> [{quoted}](name=owow,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KfhqOaeZ,comment-id=000400020002,timestamp=2015-09-17T02:10:45.492+0000)

I DO want the border.

I DO NOT want to buy him on release.

I should be able to buy a legendary skin whenever I want. There shouldn't be any limited offers to force me to buy them early.

(FYI the border isn't "extra" for Yi - he is the same price forever)
I probably won't be buying any of them any time soon, but I appreciate this level of clarity in a Rioter response. Thanks.
No problem!
will the bundle get a lower price after the first week or will it be taken out of the store completely?
The bundle will be leaving the store on the 15th, which is when the First Strike ends.
WAIT!??! will they ever be back!!? because i just spent money to get it and it wasnt there :((({{champion:11}}
Yup! They'll be back in the store on 00:01 PST on September 17th.
975rp including project yasuo?
PROJECT: Yasuo will be 50% off.
care to give insight on why yasuo got thrown aside for all these goodies aside from sync? like a border, icon etc
Cause he been out a year before this and doing something now would be a rip-off for people who bought him back then.
That's why they can charge like 300 for a border and 250 for the icon
Hi katey chaos i really need an answer on this what if i get gifted a project skin on first strike but i dont open it until first strike ends? Will i still get the borders? Thanks for answering.
From what I understand, if the item was added to your inventory (gifted) before the First Strike ends, you'll be granted the border.
u disgust me

Katey is probably the nicest Rioter there is and now you're gonna be rude to her for giving someone a response/doing her job? Theres more than likely a little "X" or red circle in the top left or right of your browser, please click it.

>
> u disgust me

She responded in a way that wasn't being a total Dickwad and this is your response?

You Disappoint Me.
Hmm...ok. I guess I'll wait.
The first week is going to be full price. Just wait out the first week and you'll get it on discount (without the border) during the second. Be patient.
Yeah

Good god, people just cannot be satisfied with anything.

THE BORDER?!?!?!
I just have a question, but why would you not want to have the special border that comes with buying it first? IMO it makes me feel like I'm owning a special skin or something lol
Yeah

I don't really care for the status that comes with the border. I just want to look at something I like during the loading screen (and I don't much like how the borders take away from everything on the inside)
Just wait until its on sale the week after.
I can't get Unchained Alistar Skin anymore! Can u help me?
